https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tDgXgQECBYlGZPmYbdweeGQuCDp.jpg Chunba and Kotetsu, grows up in the working class neighborhood of Kishiwada in Osaka in the mid-seventies. Their life in school is a never-ending series of fights and reprisals against rival gangs landing them in trouble with organised crime and in the juvenile court. Boys, Be Ambitious
